Translations.Text: haneul-i gallajigo
byeoldeul-i heut-eojimyeo
badaga yeollieo hanaga doego
modeun mudeom-i yeollieo dwieop-eoji myeo
geuttae modeun ingan-eun apseo iss-eoss deon geosdeulgwa milueossdeon geosdeul-eul alge doenola
ingandeul-iyeo gajang eunhyelousin junim-eulobuteo mueos-i neohuileul yuhog haessneunyo
geubunkkeseo neohuileul changjohago hyeong sang-eul mandeun hu gyunhyeong-eul jusieossgo
geubun-i wonhasineun hyeongtaelosseo neohuileul jieusyeoss-euna
neohuineun jinliwa simpan-eul geoyeoghamae
neohuileul gamsihaneun jadeul-eul du eossnola
ideul-eun myeong-yeloun gilogjadeul-imae
geudeul-eun neohuiga haenghaneun modeun geos-eul algo issnola
sillo uiloun jadeul-eun chugbogsog e issge doena
saaghan jadeul-eun buljiog-e iss ge doenani
geugos-eun simpan-ui nal geudeul-i deul-eogal gos-eulo
geuttae geudeul-eun geugos-eulobuteo gyeolko nagal su eobsnola
simpan-ui nal-i mueos-inji mueos i geudaeege allyeojuliyo
simpan-ui nal-i mueos-inji mueos i geudaeege allyeojuliyo
geunal-eun nugudo tain-ege hyo yong-i eobsneun nallo geunal-eun hananim-ui myeonglyeongman-i iss-eul ppun-ila
jeoul-eul sog-ineun jadeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eulgeos-ila
geudeul-eun salamdeullobuteo bad-eul ttaejeoul-eul neomchige hayeo bad-euna
geudeul-i salamdeul-ege jul ttaeneun mugeleul najchueoseo junola
geudeul-eun geudeul-i buhwaldoelila saeng gagji anhneunyo
geunal-eun widaehan nallo
modeun ingan-i man-yuui junim-ap-e seoneun nal-imyeo
saaghan jadeul-ui gilog-eun ssijin e bogwandoeeo issnola
ssijin-i mueos-inji mueos-i geudae ege allyeojuliyo
geugos-e gilogdoen gilogbuga issno la
geunal-eneun bulsinhan geudeul-ege jaeang-i iss-eul geos-iyo
simpan-ui nal-eul bujeonghaneun jadeul egedo jaeang-i iss-eul geos-ila
eoneu nugudo geugeos-eul bujeongha ji anihana omanhan jadeul-eun yeong-yeog eul beos-eonan joeindeul-ila
hananim-ui malsseum-i geuege nang songdoel ttae igeos-eun yes seonjodeul-ui uhwa yo lago malhadeola
geuleohji anhnola geudeul-ui ma-eum deul-i joeag-eulo muldeul-eo issnola
sillo geunal geudeul-eun beillo galiwojyeo balabojido moshamyeo
geudeul-eun buljiog-eulo deul-eogagedoeni
igeos-eun neohuiga geojis-ila geo yeoghaessdeon hyeonsil-ilaneun malsseum-i iss-eul geos-ila
geuleona uiloun jadeul-ui gilog eun illin-e bogwandoenani
illin-i mueos-ingaleul mueos-i geudaeege seolmyeonghayeo juliyo
geugos-e gilogdoen gilogbuga iss nola
hananim gakkaie issneun geudeul i geugeos-eul jeung-eonhal geos-ini
uiloun jadeul-eun chugbogsog-e iss ge doel geos-imyeo
geudeul-eun anlag uija-eseo bala bol geos-ila
neohuineun geudeul-ui eolgul-eseo balg eun chugbog-ui bich-eul insighal geos-imyeo
bong-indoen sunsuhan sullosseo geudeul ui galjeung-eul sighil geos-imyeo
choehuui eumlyosuneun miseukeuga doel geos-ini geugeos-eul somanghaneun ja gajge halila
geogie tasseunim-i honhabdoeeo jini
geugeos-eun hananim gakkaie iss neun jadeul-i masineun saemmul-ila
joeindeul-eun min-eum-eul gajyeossdeon ja deul-eul bius-eo
geudeul yeop-eul jinagal ttaemyeon nunjis-eulo jolonghagon hayeossgo
geudeul-i muliegelo dol-awass-eulttaeneun umul daessnola
midneunjaleul bol ttaemyeon bola ideul-i banghwanghan jadeul-ila hadeola
geuleona bulsinjadeul-eun midneunjaleulgamsihagi wihae bonaeeojin jaga a nimae
oneul-eun mid-eum-eul gajin jadeul-i geu bulsinjadeul-eul jolonghalila
ideul-eun anlag-uija-e anj-a ba lada bolila
bulsinjadeul-eun geudeul-i haenghayeossdeondaelo bosang-eul doedollyeo badji anhneunyo
